title: "Your Shop Feature" not Loading
body: Blue wheel of death... My shop isn't loading. Was working fine earlier today. Oh well. Was just about to drop some money lol.

replies.body:
Heya!

Sorry it took a while to respond to these threads on this issue, but we were able to identify what we believe was the cause and should now be fixed up! Can you try loading Your Shop again?
can you just MAYBE look at other posts about the game freezing, we all have the same issue and it all started at the same time for everyone else, FOUR DAYS AGO

> [{quoted}](name=Rule,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=V6ltZMab,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2018-06-03T19:42:42.383+0000)
>
> can you just MAYBE look at other posts about the game freezing, we all have the same issue and it all started at the same time for everyone else, FOUR DAYS AGO

Hey Rule,

Sorry its seemed like we've ignored the game freezing issue. I myself do not know what the current status of that investigation is, but will try to get caught up and see if we can give an update on what's going on.
thank you

> [{quoted}](name=Rule,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=V6ltZMab,comment-id=001b000000000000,timestamp=2018-06-03T20:54:20.868+0000)
>
> thank you

Circling back a bit but to the issue Rule & In The Flesh raised  (and others that have been having freezing issues); please check the latest information in this boards post: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/1yUAdeKV-in-game-freezing?show=flat&comment=00490000.   As mentioned in the  thread by  Riot Afic, I'm truly sorry for the delayed response we had for the game freezing issue. If still having problems, please respond to that post!

If anyone is still having issues with Your Shop, let me know!
still no shop for me
Thank you for that. It's been very frustrating to play this past week.

Mine never load to be honest^^

Guess it's because I own all purchasable skin except the 3 last one, don't deserve any promotion for those :p

> Guess it's because I own all purchasable skin except the 3 last one, don't deserve any promotion for those :p

Same thing here.  Except the last 3 I own.  


Wish they would reward those with all skins with some of the limited skins.  We spent enough I would hope!


{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
really dont get how this issue hasnt been seen at all by riot support
billion dollar company btw
It is still broken for me as well.  Only the blue loading circle Still....

It's still broken for me. I'm starting to think this isn't a personal problem, but a Riot problem. 

Hell, I've uninstalled all my Anti Virus and shut down my firewall. It still won't work.

Yep. Same with me. No matter how many times I restarted my game or my  PC id didn't load. Also leaving it didn'y help either.... Good job Riot Games. Loaded some RP in to bye some skins and still you din't let me....
sad thing is, my friend gifted me RP just do buy the skins in "my shop" {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
blue wheel of i dont want your money.
Same with me -_-
Fix this Rito! I bought RP and can't use it D:
same

Argh same...
